title: New: Fanfarlo – Vostok, I Know You Are Waiting
content:
With the release of their sophomore album Rooms Filled With Light just around the corner (28 February), London quintet Fanfarlo have made the records bonus track Vostok, I Know You Are Waiting, available to hear.

It’s a delicate, vocal driven number, with lead singer Simon Balthazar picking apart his inner feelings over the top of a minimal instrumental section. ‘They say it’ll make me sleep easier at night’ is a lyric delivered with downtrodden turmoil and an endearing sense of self-pity, sure to warm the coldest of hearts. Stream Vostok, I Know You Are Waiting Below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
